events.message: I received my order yesterday but want to request a refund because the item doesn’t match the description and I no longer want to keep it.
The system has identified keywords related to a refund request and assigned the issue to the Refund cluster for proper handling.
The case was assigned to agent Lisa M., specialized in refund processing and customer support.
Hello, I’m Lisa from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
In order to process your refund quickly, we will need the order number and the reason for your return in detail.
Sure, the order number is 12345678. I want a refund because the item was a completely different color than shown in the pictures and I am disappointed.
Thank you for the details. We can start your refund process immediately. Please send the item back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
Thanks for your quick response and help. I’ll send the item back today and await the return label so that I can complete the process.
We have emailed the prepaid return label to you. Once we receive the item back, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Hi, just following up to ensure you received the return label and to check if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I received the label and have sent the product back. Thank you for your support throughout this process.
The refund has been processed successfully and your case is now closed. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
